Classes/MTPlaceholderTextField.html#/c:@.name: tweePlaceholder

Classes/MTPlaceholderTextField.html#/s:9.name: placeholderLabel
Classes/MTPlaceholderTextField.html#/s:9.abstract: Custom placeholder label. You can use it to style placeholder text.

Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html#/s:9M.name: infoLabel
Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html#/s:9M.abstract: Info label that is shown for a user. This label will appear under the text field.

Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html#/c:@M.name: infoAnimationDuration
Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: Animation duration for showing and hiding the info label.

Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html#/c:@M.name: infoFontSize

Classes/MTActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@MTU.name: animationDuration

Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.name: blurRadius
Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.abstract: Gaussian Blur radius, larger will make the back ground shadow lighter (warning: do not set it too large, 2 or 3 for most cases)

Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.name: shadowRadiusOffSetPercentage
Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.abstract: shadow radius offset in percentage, if you want shadow radius larger, set a postive number for this, if you want it be smaller, then set a negative number

Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.name: shadowOffSetByX
Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.abstract: Shadow offset value on x axis, postive -> right, negative -> left

Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.name: shadowOffSetByY
Classes/ShadowImageView.html#/c:@M@MTUIF.abstract: Shadow offset value on y axis, postive -> right, negative -> left

Classes/MTSegmentedControl.html#/s:9MTUI.abstract: Gets called when the dragging state is changed

Classes/MTRegexTextField.html#/s:9MTUIFl.name: inputType

Classes/MTLinearProgressView.html#/c:@M@.name: firstColor
Classes/MTLinearProgressView.html#/c:@M@.abstract: First color of gradient i.e. it appears on top when angleº set to 0.0.

Classes/MTLinearProgressView.html#/c:@M@.name: secondColor
Classes/MTLinearProgressView.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Second color of gradient i.e. it appears in bottom when angleº set to 0.0.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: firstColor
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: First color of gradient i.e. it appears on top when angleº set to 0.0.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: secondColor
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: Second color of gradient i.e. it appears in bottom when angleº set to 0.0.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: angleº
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: Angleº will describe the tilt of gradient.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: colorRatio
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: Color ratio will describe the proportion of colors. It’s value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 default is 0.5.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: fadeIntensity
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: Fade intensity will describe the disperse of colors. It’s value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 default is 0.0.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: isBlur
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: Is blur allow to add visual effect on gradient view. Can’t be change during run-time.

Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.name: blurOpacity
Classes/MTGradientView.html#/c:@M@MTUIFl.abstract: Blur opacity will describe the transparency of blur. It’s value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 default is 0.0. It is suggested to set MTGradientView background color as clear color for better results.

Classes/MTBadgeButton.html#/s:9MTUIFlash.name: showBadge()
Classes/MTBadgeButton.html#/s:9MTUIFlash.abstract: 动画显示标示 (show badge with animation)

Classes/MTBadgeButton.html#/s:9MTUIFlash.name: isBadge()
Classes/MTBadgeButton.html#/s:9MTUIFlash.abstract: 获取标示状态 whether badge is showing

Classes/MTBadgeBarButton.html#/s:9MTUIFl.name: initWithCustomBadgeBarButton(_:)
Classes/MTBadgeBarButton.html#/s:9MTUIFl.abstract: 初始化并添加自定义界面 默认：背景红色，字体白色，字体14

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: value
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Current value of the stepper. Defaults to 0.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: minimumValue
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Minimum value. Must be less than maximumValue. Defaults to 0.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: maximumValue
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Maximum value. Must be more than minimumValue. Defaults to 100.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: stepValue
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Step/Increment value as in UIStepper. Defaults to 1.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: autorepeat
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: The same as UIStepper’s autorepeat. If true, holding on the buttons or keeping the pan gesture alters the value repeatedly. Defaults to true.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: showIntegerIfDoubleIsInteger
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: If the value is integer, it is shown without floating point.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: leftButtonText
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Text on the left button. Be sure that it fits in the button. Defaults to “−”.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: rightButtonText
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Text on the right button. Be sure that it fits in the button. Defaults to “+”.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: buttonsTextColor
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Text color of the buttons. Defaults to white.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: buttonsBackgroundColor
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Background color of the buttons. Defaults to dark blue.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/s:9MTUIFlash9GMS.name: buttonsFont
Classes/GMStepper.html#/s:9MTUIFlash9GMS.abstract: Font of the buttons. Defaults to AvenirNext-Bold, 20.0 points in size.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: labelTextColor
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Text color of the middle label. Defaults to white.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: labelBackgroundColor
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Text color of the middle label. Defaults to lighter blue.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/s:9MTUIFlash9GMS.name: labelFont
Classes/GMStepper.html#/s:9MTUIFlash9GMS.abstract: Font of the middle label. Defaults to AvenirNext-Bold, 25.0 points in size.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: stepCornerRadius
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Corner radius of the stepper’s layer. Defaults to 4.0.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: stepBorderWidth
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Border width of the stepper and middle label’s layer. Defaults to 0.0.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: stepBorderColor
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Color of the border of the stepper and middle label’s layer. Defaults to clear color.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: labelWidthWeight
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Percentage of the middle label’s width. Must be between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5. Be sure that it is wide enough to show the value.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.name: limitHitAnimationColor
Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Color of the flashing animation on the buttons in case the value hit the limit.

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: init

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: init with frame

Classes/GMStepper.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlash@o.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlas.name: lineWidth
Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlas.abstract: Line width for the circle, trail and checkmark parts of the switch.

Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlas.name: animatesOnTouch
Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlas.abstract: Set to false if the selection should not be animated with touch up inside events.

Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html#/c:@M@MTUIFlas.abstract: Overrides isSelected from UIControl using internal state flag.

Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html#/s:9MTUIFlash1.abstract: Switches between selected and deselected state. Use this method to programmatically change the valeu of selected state.

Classes/MTFlatSwitch.html.abstract: A flat design switch alternative to UISwitch

Classes/MTTransitionInfo.html.abstract: 图片浏览器的动画信息 see MTImageBrowserViewController

Classes/MTRegexTextField.html.abstract: 固定正则表达式的文本输入框

Classes/MTActiveTextField.html.name: MTActiveTextField
Classes/MTActiveTextField.html.abstract: 当用户开始编辑时，该类的对象可以显示动画底线。 An object of the class can show animated bottom line when a user begins editing.

Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html.name: MTAttributedTextField
Classes/MTAttributedTextField.html.abstract: 可以在文本字段下显示自定义信息标签。 An object of the class can show the custom info label under text field.

Classes/MTBorderedTextField.html.name: MTBorderedTextField
Classes/MTBorderedTextField.html.abstract: 永久显示底线。 An object of the class can show bottom line permanently.

Classes/MTPlaceholderTextField.html.name: MTPlaceholderTextField
Classes/MTPlaceholderTextField.html.abstract: 自定义的占位符标签，在开始和结束编辑时都有动画。 An object of the class has a customized placeholder label which has animations on the beginning and ending editing.

Classes/MTWalkthroughViewController.html.abstract: //Get view controllers and build the walkthrough

Classes/PopBubble.html.name: PopBubble
